name: Lost Memories (Syrammie)
description:
You are William, trapped in your past, remembering your lost memories.

Find your way around the mansion, discover secrets, and avoid running into creepy children.

All donations will contribute to equipment needed to continue the game(sound equipment, programs, engines, etc).

Controls:

WASD- Movement

Left Click - Interact

F - Open/close Doors

Right Click - Turn on/off flashlight

Build v1.08:

  • Only able to explore the mansion and interact with some objects.
  • Ability to save and load game.
  • Continue loads last loaded save
  • Loading screens

Made by Team Rainbow Tiger

Stephen Mitchell - Texture artist, 3D modeling, Level design

Ryan Moninghoff - Texture artist, 3D modeling, animations

Zach Proctor - 3D modeling

Chris Phillips - Sound

Caleb Bennik - Story Layout

Amarise Knapick - Programming

Questions? Comment? Concerns? Just want to show your support for the game? Feel free to email us at amarise.knapick@gmail.com. We welcome criticism to help us improve on this game.

We will respond as quickly as possible regardless of what the message is. Thank you for your support.
